pr_title: Fix for confirmation email resending issue

timeline.message: Fix for confirmation email resending issue

timeline.bodyText: Why we copy org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.authentication.endpoint.util to the runtimes, this jar is already available it the plugins. Duplicating jars in two places is not recommended. If there is an issue with getting class from this jar in webapp level, we need to fix this other than coping it.
timeline.author: senthalan

replies.bodyText: This is removed from the plugins and added to cxf runtime, mainly because this should only be needed by the webapps, but not in the OSGi runtime.
replies.author: madurangasiriwardena

replies.bodyText: okay. sorry for the confusion. In this case, can we add to a different runtime environment and include that environment in the needed web apps. If we add to cxf3, this jar will be loaded for all the CXF web apps in the start-up. But I think only some apps use this
replies.author: senthalan

replies.bodyText:
If org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.authentication.endpoint.util  component is copied only to the 'authentication endpoint' web app libs, the following error is logged when the server gets up,
Error configuring application listener of class [org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.authentication.endpoint.util.listener.AuthenticationEndpointContextListener] java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.authentication.endpoint.util.listener.AuthenticationEndpointContextListener
replies.author: AnuradhaSK
